text: kaho, "kya ham allaah ko chhodakar use pukaarane lag jaen jo na to hamen laabh pahuncha sake aur na hamen haani pahuncha sake aur ham ulate paanv phir jaen, jabaki allaah ne hamen maarg par laga diya hai? - us vyakti kee tarah jise shaitaanon ne dharatee par bhataka diya ho aur vah hairaan hokar rah gaya ho. usake kuchh saathee ho, jo use maarg kee or bula rahe ho ki hamaare paas chala aa!" kah do, "maargadarshan keval allaah ka maargadarshan hai aur hamen isee baat ka aadesh hua hai ki ham saare sansaar ke svaamee ko samarpit ho jaen.
